statement.tex: %text What would be the equivalent \underline\text{roster} form of the following set? \[ \qquad C = \lbrace x:x^2+7x+10 = 0,x\in\mathbb{N} \rbrace\] %
\\ %text Which of the tables below correctly shows what set-builder and roster notations are? %
\\ %text Given that $C = \lbrace x:x^2+7x+10 = 0,x\in\mathbb{N} \rbrace$ is in set-builder notation, \underline\text{is the following} \underline\text{correct}? %

options.tex: \begin{tabular}{|c|c|} \hline & \text{Meaning} \\ \hline \text{Set builder} & \lbrace x:\texttt{ list of conditions on x}\rbrace \\ \hline \text{Roster} & \lbrace a_1,a_2, a_3, \ldots \rbrace \\ \hline \end{tabular}

\begin{tabular}{|c|c|} \hline & \text{Meaning} \\ \hline \text{Set builder} & \lbrace a_1,a_2, a_3, \ldots \rbrace \\ \hline \text{Roster} & \lbrace x:\texttt{ list of conditions on x}\rbrace \\ \hline \end{tabular}

%text \underline\text{No $x$} satisfies both the conditions in $C$.
Hence, $C=\lbrace\rbrace = \phi$. %
